name: Avoid (itch) (jocelyart)
description:
In a world completely invaded by demonic creatures where humans' lives are at their mercy. No weapons are effective against them. One unique way for humanity to survive this hell is to hide from it or to avoid it.

A challenging short game in which you must dodge bosses' attacks and stay on your feet at the end of the timer.

Without patience, keyboard dexterity, and sharp reflexes, you will only be able to imagine beating the boss. Repeated tries are the key.

CONTROLS

                                                                                                            AZERTY     /     QWERTY

      F5 - Fullscreen

* I'd suggest you to check the "how to play" in the options and warm up before starting the experiment.

Warning:

* The game has been tested on Windows and Linux . Sorry in advance  for Mac users if you have any problem launching the game so let me know if someone tested it.
